headline: MESO Stock Up as FDA Approves Ryoncil for Graft Versus Host Disease
summary: The FDA approves Mesoblast's Ryoncil (remestemcel-L) for treating pediatric patients with steroid-refractory acute graft versus host disease. Shares rise.

raw.headline: MESO Stock Up as FDA Approves Ryoncil for Graft Versus Host Disease
